summary: A unit‑test collection that validates the creation, loading, and persistence of speech‑recognition models (CTC and RNNT) possibly combined with a text‑to‑speech component, checking configuration‑based instantiation, pretrained checkpoints (including fused batch‑norm variants), and save/restore functionality.
business_intent: Guarantee that ASR models integrated with TTS can be reliably instantiated from various sources and safely persisted, supporting robust deployment and maintenance of speech‑processing services.
